column5: Martin Strel plans to swim the Amazon, 3375 miles in 70 days.   Swimming the Amazon
he's going to die he'll get bit by a snake
WOW that is amazing... I was watching some of the videos.... that guy has a set of brass ones for sure...  thanks for the link!  Gerritt.
Man, I would never have the kahoonas for that, but I remember seing a video of some young guys surfing the mouth in that milky brown water.

Pirahnas chewing at your tinkle tinkle.  Crocs/alligators snapping their jaws on your legs.  Anacondas looking for a snack.  Spiders the size of plates ready to sink their fangs into you and inject a little venom. Then, when the paralysis sets in, they'll drain some blood to satisfy a draculan thirst for the red nectar of life.   Aw heck, if he can do it, so can I. .....and I can leap tall buildings in a single bound too.
Chuck Norris, watch out... you have a new rival.
I know.  Like I said, it's all downstream.  Lil' Chuckie, take notes, yer goin to school.  BTW, who's your tailor?
If a critter don't git em...a virus or bacteria will. Either way he's doomed. All the power to em though, just don't see myself doin it.
